lines.text: Anybody seen Richie? Anybody know why Richie did Bobby Lupo?
Motherfucker, you knocked my teeth out!
[Gino hits him again]
You wouldn't say that shit if Richie was here.
Yeah, but Richie ain't here! Know why? 'Cause he's a chickenshit fuckin' pussy asshole!

[while questioning Patti in the club]
Who's this one over here?
Which one?
The one with nipples you could dial a phone with.
What about you, Paulie? You got the fuckin' balls?
Yeah, yeah I got the balls.
[Richie tosses him a wad of cash]
Now you've got the bread.
[after breaking up a fight]
You talking to me, man?
Who the fuck you think you are, huh?
You like to beat up on fuckin' women, is that it? Beat up on me asshole.
[after intimidating the entire bar]
I swear he's nothing without that badge and gun.
Really? Let me show you something.
[unloads and drops gun]
There's my gun.
[holds up police badge]
And here's my badge. Fair game now, ok? This is your trophy, this is your trophy! Come and get it.
I offer five thousand for that badge.
You, fuck nuts!
Hey, you talk to me?
Yeah, would you have to be the guy who threw a puppy out of the window of this car the other day?
Hey, why's that your fuckin' business anyway?
Cause I'm the animal lover.
Animal lover, huh? Look, asshole, if you won't mind your fuckin' business I'll place you in the fuckin' receptacle and toss you out of the fuckin' window. How about that?
You're the tough guy, huh?
Tough guy? I'll show you how fuckin' tough guy I am.
Cops been in and outta here all night, but it's you I've been expecting. Kinda figured you'd save the best for yourself.
How you doing, Patti?
I can still get it wet. How bout you, Gino?
Me? I can't believe you can still eat with that mouth.
Don't go pushing my patrons around, ya prick ya.
Prick? Look around you over here; is this the proper setting for profanity?
Hey, fuck you.
[after beating up the entire bar]
Anybody seen Richie? I'm gonna keep comin' back until someone REMEMBERS seein' Richie.
What are ya gonna do? Shoot me? I'm outta bullets!
Nope, but you see those bullets could've saved you a lot of pain.
I like pain.
I'm gettin too old for this shit, Gino.
lines.character: Capt. Ronnie Donziger Homicide Division NYPD

lines.text: I know what you mean.
Now look, I feed you every dope-dealing guy he's got, but let me do it my way. Just give me an unmarked and a shotgun.
Whose hot dog is this, eh?
